title: 34: OBITCH we're doing the breast we can...
description:
Join us for possibly our most chaotic episode to date…it might even need a graphic advisory? Madison comes in with some bizarre famous wills, and then Spencer gets into a weird question that had his coffin spinning this week. We’ve got some iconic obituaries, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
NOBODY!
Sources: 
https://smartasset.com/estate-planning/what-is-a-will http://www.thelostdutchmangoldmine.com/lost-dutchman/james-kidd-missing/ https://www.encyclopedia.com/science/encyclopedias-almanacs-transcripts-and-maps/kidd-james-1879-ca-1949 https://www.wcax.com/2021/11/05/bowman-mansion-mausoleum-be-honored-with-historical-marker/ https://brovidly.com/famous-last-wills/ http://www.houdini.org/seance.html https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/70298/enduring-tradition-houdini-seance-halloween https://www.vanityfair.com/news/2003/06/marilyn-monroe-and-lee-strasberg-200306 http://thedamienzone.com/2010/12/30/marilyn-monroes-estate-is-mrs-strasberg-greedy-you-judge/ https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/70298/enduring-tradition-houdini-seance-halloween#:~:text=Bess%20held%20the%20first%20séance%20after%20Houdini’s%20death,promote%20the%20Houdini%20name%20after%20the%20magician’s%20death https://mix957gr.com/im-not-drunk-i-just-have-big-boobs-stupid-criminal-of-the-day/ https://mix957gr.com/im-not-drunk-i-just-have-big-boobs-stupid-criminal-of-the-day/ https://www.bustle.com/articles/109465-what-happens-to-breast-implants-after-you-die-mortician-caitlyn-doughty-gives-us-mortals-the-411 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3836773/ https://www.quora.com/If-a-lactating-woman-dies-is-it-possible-to-get-by-pumping-the-last-batch-of-milk-from-her-dead-body-s-breasts
See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

Join us for possibly our most chaotic episode to date…it might even need a graphic advisory? Madison comes in with some bizarre famous wills, and then Spencer gets into a weird question that had his coffin spinning this week. We’ve got some iconic obituaries, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls!
